trans-unit.resname: PMAT·6p | Tazri, Stalwart Survivor | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Each creature you control has "{T}: Add one mana of any of this creature's colors. Spend this mana only to activate an ability of a creature. Activate only if this creature has another activated ability." {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}, {T}: Mill five cards. Put all creature cards with activated abilities that aren't mana abilities from among the milled cards into your hand.

trans-unit.resname: PMAT·43p | Rebuild the City | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Choose target land. Create three tokens that are copies of it, except they're 3/3 creatures in addition to their other types and they have vigilance and menace. (They're affected by summoning sickness.)

trans-unit.resname: PMAT·43p | Rebuild the City | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Phyrexian design had to go, but the materials could be put to good use.
{T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Put two +1/+1 counters on target non-Human creature that entered the battlefield this turn.
Like Orn before it, Drannith was reduced to a playground for Ikoria's monsters.
